T04sanss09u:1: tad evam aviratapravṛttāṃ bahusukhāṃ dauḥś-lyôtpattiṃ rakṣann evaṃ ca karmâvaraṇavibandham apanayan kleśaviśodhane prayateta //
T04sanss09u:9: tatrâpi vikṣepapraśamanânabhiyuktasya cittaṃ na samādhīyatae iti /
T04sanss09u:11: samāhitasya ca na kiñcit phalam anyatra kleśaśodhanād iti /
T04sanss09u:26: yae ime ādhyātmikāḥ śokaparidevaduṣkha daurmanasyôpāyāsās tān kṣamate 'dhivāsayatîti //
T04sanss09u:29: punar aparaṃ gṛhapate gṛhiṇā bodhisatvenânunayapratighâpagatena bhavitavyam aṣṭalokadharmânanuliptena /
T04sanss09u:30: tena bhogalābhena vā bhāryāputralābhena vā dhanadhānyavittalābhena vā nônnamitavyaṃ na praharṣitavyaṃ /
T04sanss09u:32: na durmanasā bhavitavyaṃ evaṃ cânena pratyavekṣitavyaṃ /
T04sanss09u:41: yady asty eva pratīkāro daurmanasyena tatra kim /
T04sanss09u:44: taccintayā mudhā yānti hrasvam āyur muhur muhuḥ //
T04sanss09u:51: duryodhanaṃ cittaṃ te dārike utpādayitavyaṃ sarvakleśanirghātāya /
T04sanss09u:54: na câbhyāsasya duṣkaraṃ nāma kiñcid asti /
T04sanss09u:55: tathā hi mūḍhatarāṇām api tāvad bhārahāraka-
T04sanss09u:57: kaivartakarṣakâdīnāṃ duṣkhâbhyāsāt kṣudrataraphale 'pi vastuni saṃrūḍhakiṇâṅkitaṃ cittam avasādena na paribhūyate /
T04sanss09u:59: tathā prākṛtâpi kiñcid apakāriṣv ātmaduṣkṛtenâiva hateṣu svayaṃ mṛtyuṣu prahartuṃ gāḍhaprahāravedanâpi saṃgrāmayanty eva /
T04sanss09u:60: ki.ṃ punar drāghiṣṭhakālâpakāriṣu duṣkhôpāttakuśaladhanalavastainyeṣu narakeṣu nâvadhyaghātakeṣu
T04sanss09u:62: anavadhikalpâbaddhadṛḍhavaireṣu kleśaśatruṣu prahartum utsāho duṣkhasahanaṃ vā na bhavet /
T04sanss09u:66: tathā sarvaduṣkhôtpādeṣu sukhasaṃjñā pratyupasthānâbhyāsāt sukhasaṃjñâiva pratyupatiṣṭhate /
T04sanss09u:67: etan niṣyandaphalaṃ ca sarvadharmasukhâkrāntaṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratila-
T04sanss09u:72: yasya samādheḥ pratilambhād bodhisatvaḥ sarvârambaṇavastuṣu sukhām eva vedanāṃ vedayate /
T04sanss09u:74: tasya nairayikām api kāraṇāṃ kāryamāṇasya sukhasaṃjñâiva pratyupasthitā bhavati /
T04sanss09u:75: mānuṣīm api kāraṇāṃ kāryamāṇasya hasteṣv api chidyamāneṣu pādeṣv api karṇeṣv api nāsāsv api sukhasaṃjñâiva pratyupasthitā bhavati /
T04sanss09u:76: vetrair api tāḍyamānasyârddhavetrair api kaśābhir api tāḍyamānasya sukhasaṃ-
T04sanss09u:82: naḍacippitikaṃ vā cipyamānasya tailapradyotikaṃ vâdīpyamānasya sarpiḥpradyotikaṃ vā dadhipradyotikaṃ vâdīpyamānasya sukhasaṃjñâiva pratyupasthitā bhavati /
T04sanss09u:83: ulkāmukhaṃ vā hriyamāṇasya siṃhamukhaṃ vā hriyamāṇasya śuṣkavarttikāṃ vā vartyamānasya //
T04sanss09u:85: kārṣāpaṇacchedikaṃ vā chidyamānasya piṣṭapācanikaṃ vā pācyamānasya hastibhir vā mardyamānasya sukhasaṃjñâiva pravartate /
T04sanss09u:86: akṣiṇy-utpāṭhyamāne jīvaśūlikam api kriyamāṇasya sarvaśo vâghātaṃ nirṇīya śirasi vā prapātyamāne sukhasaṃjñâiva pravartate /
T04sanss09u:90: tathā hi bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya dīrgharātraṃ caryāṃ caratâitat praṇidhānam abhūt /
T04sanss09u:95: ye māṃ pālayeyuḥ satkuryur gurukuryur mānayeyuḥ pūjayeyuḥ sarve te upaśamasukhasya lābhino bhaveyuḥ /
T04sanss09u:96: ye 'pi mām ākrośeyur visparśeyus tāḍayeyuḥ śastreṇâchindyur yāvat sarvaśo jīvitād vyaparopayeyuḥ sarve te saṃbodhisukhasya lābhino bhaveyuḥ
T04sanss09u:99: ebhiḥ praṇidhibhiḥ samanvāgataḥ sarvasatvânugatāṃ sukhasaṃjñām āsevate nisevate bhāvayati bahulīkaroti /
T04sanss09u:100: sa tasya karmaṇo vipākena sarvadharmasukhâkrāntaṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratilabhate /
T04sanss09u:101: yasmin samaye bodhisatvena sarvadharmasukhâkrānto nāma samādhiḥ pratilabdho bhavati tasmin samaye 'kṣobhyo bhavaty asaṃhāryaḥ sarvamārakarmabhir iti vistaraḥ //
T04sanss09u:113: yāvad dharmânusmaraṇāt prītiḥ prasādaḥ prāmodyaṃ cittasyânavalīnatânavamṛdyatâparitarṣaṇā /
T04sanss09u:115: cittasya prāmodyaṃ kāyasyâudbilyaṃ buddheḥ saṃpraharṣaṇaṃ manasôtplavaḥ /
T04sanss09u:156: iti hi yā sarvêndriyeṣv anavalīnêndriyatêyam ucyate muditêty ādi //
T04sanss09u:157: atra ca śikṣitān bodhisatvān idaṃ vacanam alaṃkaroti yad uktam āryamahāmeghe /
T04sanss09u:158: nirayagaticittanityasamādhānaśīlāś ca nirayagatipriyāś ca nirayagatipattanavaṇijaś ca bhavanti /
T04sanss09u:159: nirayalolāś ca bhavanti nirayalobhamatsariṇaś ca nirayâgnicittapraguṇṇāḥ bhavantîti //
T04sanss09u:163: anāryair duḥśīlaiḥ satvair mārair mārakāyikābhir vā devatābhir mārâdhiṣṭhitair vā māradūtair vā viheṭhyamānaḥ samīryamāṇaḥ kṣobhyamānas tarjyamānas tāḍyamāno na bhidyate tato /
T04sanss09u:178: sarvasatvabhārāṃś ca sahate uttārayati vā na ca khidyate /
T04sanss09u:194: sacet punar ete satvā yāvanto daśasu dikṣu prabhāvyamānāḥ prabhāvyante te sarve 'siśaktitomarapāliyogena māṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nubadhnīyuḥ
T04sanss09u:195: yatrâiṣa pṛthivīpradeśe sthito vā niṣaṇṇo vā caṅkramyamāṇo vā śayāno vā bodhicittam
T04sanss09u:196: utpādayiṣyati dānacittaṃ vā yāvat prajñācittaṃ vā śrutakuśalamūlacittaṃ vôtpādayiṣyati
T04sanss09u:197: tatrâsya pṛthivīpradeśe śatadhābadarīpattrapramāṇaṃ kāyaṃ chetsyāmo vikariṣyāmo vidhvaṃsayiṣyāmas /
T04sanss09u:198: te cet sarvasatvā mām ākrośayeyuḥ paribhāṣeran kutsayeyuḥ paṃsayeyur asatyābhir vāgbhiḥ
T04sanss09u:200: mama kāyaṃ chindhyur bhindyur vikareyur vidhvaṃsayeyuḥ /
T04sanss09u:201: evaṃ mayā na kasyacit satvasyântike kṣobhacittam utpādayitavyaṃ /
T04sanss09u:203: pūrvā koṭiḥ saṃsārasyâpramāṇīkṛtā yatra me 'yam ātmabhāvo narakagatasyâpi tiryagyonigatasyâpi
T04sanss09u:204: yamalokagatasyâpi manuṣyagatasyâpi kāmâhārapaliguddhasya dharmān aśrutavato viṣamâjīvagocarasya
T04sanss09u:205: nirarthakajīvinaḥ aṅgapratyaṅgasya śatadhā chinno bhinno nikṛtto vividhābhiś ca kāraṇābhiḥ
T04sanss09u:206: kārito na ca mayā tato nidānam ātmârthaṃ kṛto na parârthaḥ /
T04sanss09u:207: sacet punar punar mamâite sarvasatvâparântakoṭiṃ chindyur bhindyur vikireyur vidhvaṃsayeyus tathâpi mayâparityaktâiva sarvajñatā /
T04sanss09u:215: nairayikasya duṣkhasya śatatamīm api kalāṃ nôpaiti yāvad upaniṣadam api na kṣamate /
T04sanss09u:217: na punar mayā buddhadharmāḥ parityaktavyā na sarvasatvârambaṇā mahākaruṇā //
T04sanss09u:224: evaṃ dharmagaṇanâviṣṭaḥ sāgaramate bodhisatvaḥ sarvasatvapīḍāṃ sahate //
T04sanss09u:228: yat kāye chidyamāne sarvasatvān maitryā spharati /
T04sanss09u:231: yat kāye chidyamāne yâivâsya kāyaṃ chindati teṣām eva pramokṣârthaṃ kṣamate /
T04sanss09u:232: na ca cittena kṣaṇyate kṣāntibalaṃ côpadarśayatîyam asya kṣāntipāramitā //
T04sanss09u:233: yena vīryeṇa taṃ sarvajñatāchandaṃ nôtsṛjati cittabalâdhīnaṃ ca pratigṛhṇāti /
T04sanss09u:237: yat kāye vikīryamāṇe tat sarvajñatācittôtpādaratnaṃ kartuṃ na saṃmuhyati bodhim evâpekṣate śāntapraśāntam eva pratyavekṣate /
T04sanss09u:239: yat kāye chidyamāne kāyasya tṛṇakāṣṭhakuḍyavatpratibhāsôpamatāṃ pratyavekṣate māyādharmatāṃ ca kāyasyâvatarati /
T04sanss09u:240: bhūtânityatāṃ ca bhūtaduṣkhatāṃ ca bhūtânātmatāṃ ca bhūtaśāntatāṃ ca kāyasyôpanidhyāyati /
T04sanss09u:248: eṣâiva tāvan mayā satvaḥ pūrvataraṃ bodhimaṇḍe niṣādayitavyaḥ /
T04sanss09u:253: īdṛśānām asmābhiḥ satvānām adāntānām aguptānām anupaśāntānām arthāya saṃnŌühŌüḥ saṃnaddhavyŌüḥ //
T04sanss09u:266: lābhā me durlabdhā yo 'haṃ jalpite pratijalpāmi /
T04sanss09u:267: yena mayā sarvasatvānāṃ saṃkramabhūtena bhavitavyaṃ so 'haṃ parasya tvam ity api vācaṃ bhāṣe /
T04sanss09u:271: parato duruktān durāgatān durbhāṣitān bhāṣyamāṇān vacanapathān śṛṇvatā cittaṃ nâghātayitavyaṃ /
T04sanss09u:272: pareṣām antike na mamâitat sādhu na pratirūpaṃ yo 'haṃ parasya doṣântaraṃ saṃjanayeyam /
T04sanss09u:273: etan na mama pratirūpaṃ yad ahaṃ pareṣāṃ doṣântaram api saṃśrotavyaṃ manye /
T04sanss09u:275: na mayâśayo vikopayitavyo yena mayā sarvasatvāḥ sarvasukhôpadhānena sukhayitavyāḥ parinirvāpayitavyāś cânuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya tatra nāmâhaṃ vyāpadye /
T04sanss09u:276: na ca mayā pareṣāṃ svaparāddhānām api vyāpattavyaṃ /
T04sanss09u:280: na mayā jīvitântarāye 'pi kriyamāṇe kṣobhaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
T04sanss09u:283: ye kruddhāḥ satvās tān āśvāsayati kṣamāpayati /
